TextBlock.Text: Baeck: The red-eyed horned bukrad, commonly known as the 'Tanis', was first discovered by biologist Kheye of the Lovic clan.
Baeck: The large predator is at the apex of its habitat in the steppes of Korvo IV.
Baeck: Its four main legs allowing it to pounce before a fifth smaller leg quickly snaps the neck of its prey.
Baeck: Kheye ended up stranded on the planet for weeks after one Tanis attacked his shuttle.
Baeck: Fortunately, Kheye was rescued and after relaying his finding, a strict ban was imposed on the planet.
